body_html:
About code organization, caffe2 already has this weird pattern that they include .cpp files on a per-file basis to the mobile build. There is no clear separation in the folder structure for files that are or aren't used in mobile. I'm, however, introducing an ATen/utils folder and plan to put this file there. It's introduced in #9897 and I will move ArrayRef there.

I wasn't doing it in this PR, because I didn't figure out yet how to set the build system up for this.

It's introduced in #9897 and I will move ArrayRef there.
I wasn't doing it in this PR, because I didn't figure out yet how to set the build system up for this.
body:
About code organization, caffe2 already has this weird pattern that they include .cpp files on a per-file basis to the mobile build. There is no clear separation in the folder structure for files that are or aren't used in mobile. I'm, however, introducing an ATen/utils folder and plan to put this file there. It's introduced in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/9897 and I will move ArrayRef there.

I wasn't doing it in this PR, because I didn't figure out yet how to set the build system up for this.
